title: thunderlords keystone is the most overpowered load of horse crap ive ever seen
body: i think the title says it all n its viable on every champ and build becos the dmg is so freaking disgusting, which genius decided this was a solid injection into a game that revolves around balance?

replies.body: If it is so overpowered, why is not on every champ in every game?
I remember league of thunderlords back in the day
Ofc, but such is not the case now is it? :P

> [{quoted}](name=Yaiamone,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=jxVIhZ2E,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2017-05-17T23:23:07.073+0000)
>
> I remember league of thunderlords back in the day

good times

Technically deathfire touch does more damage assuming you can keep 100% uptime of it.

In the time it takes thunderfury to get the second proc off deathfire will have outdamaged the first proc of thunderfury assuming permanent uptime which is easy using dots.
HAHA you should of seen it before it was nerfed and almost every single person took it every game. Thunderlords is nothing compared to what it was on release.
Thunderlords in fine, it only starts to ram up damage at level 9/10 when they buy damage items. it only does between 10-70 damage lvls 1-6, that is soley because people buy damage.
It's not viable on every champ. But I'm lower levels people tend to use it on every champ cause they don't really know what they're doing.
